questions.name: externalSystemBaseline
questions.label: What is the baseline external systems are required to meet?  ex:  FedRAMP Moderate; FedRAMP High

questions.name: informationLocation
questions.label: The location of information processing, information or data, AND system services shall be restricted (H) to U.S./U.S. Territories or geographic locations where there is U.S. jurisdiction based on all High impact data, systems, or services. ; (M) to  organization-defined locations based on organization-defined requirements or conditions

questions.name: threatModelingTools
questions.label: What tools are used for threat modeling and vuln analysis during develpment (customer must provide)?
